body.p: Select the section below and use the AI Positron Assistant Marketing->Features-Advantages-Benefits action to generate a marketing post.

The Oxygen AI Positron Assistant offers predefined AI actions, user-defined actions, and favorites for chat sessions. It provides features like editable chat interactions, AI fixes for errors, XPath AI-based functions, and custom author actions that invoke AI processing. The tool also supports Schematron validation and AI-based quick-fixes, refactoring actions, code generation, streaming mode for actions, and context-specific information.
